channel.title: Installation on Lifecycle Manager Learning Center
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on Lifecycle Manager Learning Center

item.title: Installation
item.description: Pre-requisites Read What is Agile Lifecycle Manager (ALM) and watch ALM in action Understand the Key Concepts of ALM If installing the CI/CD Hub then be familiar with the concepts of a CI/CD in the context of ALM Choose your install path Read the Deployment Model and determine which of the following install paths apply to you: Install CI/CD Hub Install ALM Install Resource Manager
